q2: When was the last time Italy wasn't disappointing?
a2: In 2006 when they won the world cup
q3: Who shot the decisive goal in the finals of the 2006 World Cup for Italy?
a3: Fabio Grosso scored the final goal.
a4: The oponent to Italy in the 2006 World Cup final was France.
q5: How have they managed to fall so far in such a comparatively short time?
a5: The players had a lots of scandals and they changed coaches way too often.
